SEARCH
Package chess

Interface ChessBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
MyChessBoard
public interface ChessBoard
A chessboard that can hold and rearrange chess pieces

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPiece(ChessPosition position, ChessPiece piece)
    Adds a chess piece to the chessboard
    ChessPiece
    getPiece(ChessPosition position)
    Gets a chess piece on the chessboard
    void
    resetBoard()
    Sets the board to the default starting board (How the game of chess normally starts)

  • Method Details

    • addPiece

      void addPiece(ChessPosition position, ChessPiece piece)
      Adds a chess piece to the chessboard
      Parameters:
      position - where to add the piece to
      piece - the piece to add

    • getPiece

      ChessPiece getPiece(ChessPosition position)
      Gets a chess piece on the chessboard
      Parameters:
      position - The position to get the piece from
      Returns:
      Either the piece at the position, or null if no piece is at that position

    • resetBoard

      void resetBoard()
      Sets the board to the default starting board (How the game of chess normally starts)
